author: CMS-HGCAL
body:
#### PR description:

It's useful to inspect the raw data for some events/FEDs using the tester under DataFormats/FEDRawData
For Phase II the raw data collection to be used has been  updated to RawDataBuffer and the tester could not run anymore.
This PR proposes an update to the tester by introducing a new parameter which can be used to switch between the two collecitons

#### PR validation:

Used HGCAL test beam raw data stored in Phase I and Phase II formats.
title: Update FED Raw Data Dumper tester
